item.title: Repost from ErynnBrook https://twitter.com/ErynnBrook/statuses/1122702924109324290/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Repost from ErynnBrook https://twitter.com/ErynnBrook/statuses/1122702924109324290/:

You guys, no spoilers, I promise. But I’m gonna tell you why Maisie Williams is even more badass than you thought.

She’s not left handed in real life.

She made the choice to play Arya left handed when she was 12 because Arya favors her left hand in the books.

#GameOfThrones

item.description: The internet is too enamored with Lyanna Mormont. She seems like the perfect character to kill off in S07E01 :p #GameofThrones
